node.name: mikeclipse
node.shortdescription:
Mikeclipse provides features that make it easier for developers who use Eclipse to integrate their projects with the Mike (http://mikeci.com) platform.


Mike’s simple, hosted continuous integration service enables Java development teams to collaborate more effectively. Don’t worry about managing your build and CI environment, let Mike do that.



The first release of the plug-in provides helpful wizards for accelerating the creation of new Eclipse Dynamic Web projects that can be built by Mike. Spring-MVC and Struts2 project types are supported.



You can view a video which demonstrates how the plug-in works at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qWRbc9DUMQU.
node.body:
Mikeclipse provides features that make it easier for developers who use Eclipse to integrate their projects with the Mike (http://mikeci.com) platform.


Mike’s simple, hosted continuous integration service enables Java development teams to collaborate more effectively. Don’t worry about managing your build and CI environment, let Mike do that.



The first release of the plug-in provides helpful wizards for accelerating the creation of new Eclipse Dynamic Web projects that can be built by Mike. Spring-MVC and Struts2 project types are supported.



You can view a video which demonstrates how the plug-in works at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qWRbc9DUMQU.
